title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.24 - Inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.24 - Inspections

State Regulations

The commissioner shall require the inspection of all
coin-operated machines subject to the application of this Part, and all places
in which such machines are exposed for operation, at such times as he or she
finds necessary for the protection of the lives, health and safety of employees
and of persons lawfully using such machines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
